original: [From.GetDynName] has decided that she will take over the regency for her [From.GetSonDaughter],  [From.GetTitledFirstName]. It seems there is nothing you can do about it...
translation: [From.GetDynName]决定成为她的[From.GetSonDaughter]，[From.GetTitledFirstName]的摄政。你对此似乎无能为力……

original: I see...
translation: 我知道了……

original: I don't think so!
translation: 我不这么认为！

original: Your mother [FromFrom.GetFirstName] has decided that it is best that she rule as your regent instead of [From.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: 你的母亲[FromFrom.GetFirstName]认为由她代替[From.GetTitledFirstName]成为你的摄政是最好选择。

original: I am sure she knows best.
translation: 我相信我妈妈是最好的。

original: Hmm... who really rules this [From.PrimaryTitle.GetTier]?
translation: 哼……到底谁才是[From.PrimaryTitle.GetTier]的主人？

original: Persistent and disturbingly detailed rumors have it that your mother [Root.Mother.GetFirstName] has managed to seduced your [From.GetHusbandWife] [From.GetFirstName], engaging in carnal relations behind your back...
translation: 有一个令人不安却又有眉有眼的流言：你的母亲[Root.Mother.GetFirstName]试图勾引你的[From.GetHusbandWife][From.GetFirstName]，并且两人背着你发生了肉体关系……

original: I am sure it is nothing.
translation: 我确定那是子虚乌有的事情。

original: That's it. Mother must be sent to a convent.
translation: 事情就是这样。母亲大人应该被送去修道院！

original: Alas, I must send [From.GetFirstName] away.
translation: 天哪，我得把[From.GetFirstName]送走。

original: They must both be punished.
translation: 他们两个都应该受到惩罚！

original: It pains me, but the dungeon is the only option.
translation: 这令人痛苦，但地牢才是奸夫淫妇的归宿。

original:
To my former liege, [Root.GetFirstNameWithNick],

It is with great regret that I must inform you that I am declaring fealty to the true ruler of the Franks. I do not find your claim at all satisfactory and have decided to serve the stronger King.

For the glory of the Frankish Empire,
[From.GetBestName]
translation:
致我的故主，[Root.GetFirstNameWithNick]，

很遗憾的的告知您，我们已经宣誓效忠法兰克人的真正国王。我对您的宣称极不满意，我已经决定效忠更强大的王者。

为了法兰克帝国之荣耀，
[From.GetBestName]

original: This is unfortunate...
translation: 这真是不幸……

original: Somesvara I became king of the Western Chalukyas in 1042, after which he founded the city of Kalyani and made it his capital. He was a very active and energetic ruler but spent most of his reign fighting wars against a succession of rulers from the Chola Dynasty, who were his rivals for domination of Vengi. Unable to achieve victory against his enemies and tormented by an incurable illness, Somesvara ultimately took his own life by drowning himself in the Tungabhadra River.
translation: 苏迷湿伐罗一世在建伽莲尼城后于 1042 年成为西遮娄其国王并定都于此。他虽然勤政英武却尽他毕生之力与来自朱罗王朝的竞争者为瓶耆的统治权而相争。由于不能战胜宿敌以及绝症的折磨，苏迷湿伐罗最终于东伽跋陀罗河投水自尽。

original: You are getting tired of serving [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName], but [Root.Liege.GetSheHe] is very powerful. Perhaps it is time to seek foreign allies - the Franks to the north are growing ever more powerful and surely have no love for the [Root.Liege.GetOnlyDynastyName]s. You could promise them your fealty in exchange for assistance - you needn't keep your promise once they have helped you...
translation: 你已不愿继续屈膝于[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]，但[Root.Liege.GetSheHe]非常强大。也许寻求外援才是正确方法——北方的法兰克人日益强大并且他们对[Root.Liege.GetOnlyDynastyName]一族并无好感。你可以向他们许以称臣来换取援军——当然在得到他们的援助后你履行不履行你的诺言就是另一回事了……

original: I will send a messenger.
translation: 我会派出信使。

original: No, it's not worth the risk.
translation: 不，这不值得。

original: You have received a most unusual embassy from Spain. An emissary from [From.GetTitledNameWithNick] comes before you and speaks: 'My [From.GetLordLady] has come to request your assistance against the evil [From.Liege.GetTitledName]. [From.GetSheHeCap] asks for a pledge of your armed assistance in rebellion, and in return [From.GetSheHe] will swear fealty to you once the yoke of [From.Liege.GetOnlyDynastyName] oppression is off [From.GetHerHis] back.
translation: 一位与众不同的信使从西班牙来到了你的宫廷。这位来自 [From.GetTitledNameWithNick]的密使来到你的面前说道：「我的[From.GetLordLady]请求您支援其反抗暴君 [From.Liege.GetTitledName]之义举。[From.GetSheHeCap]希望您能出兵支援，作为回报，[From.GetSheHe]将在摆脱 [From.Liege.GetOnlyDynastyName]压迫在[From.GetHerHis]背上的枷锁后向您效忠。」

original: Very well, we shall sign an agreement to that effect.
translation: 很好很好，让我们为此签署一份协定吧。

original: I'm sorry, Spanish politics do not interest me.
translation: 对不起，我并不想介入西班牙事务。

original: Your emissaries have returned from Francia with bad news. [From.GetTitledName] has declined your request for assistance against your [Root.Liege.GetOnlyDynastyName] overlords.
translation: 你的特使从法兰克带来了坏消息。[From.GetTitledName]拒绝支援你反抗 [Root.Liege.GetOnlyDynastyName]的斗争。

original: This crushes my hopes.
translation: 这毁了我的希望！

original: Your emissaries have returned from Francia with good news. [From.GetTitledName] has accepted your offer and pledged to help you in your rebellion against your [Root.Liege.GetOnlyDynastyName] overlords.
translation: 你的特使从法兰克带来了好消息。[From.GetTitledName]接受了你的请求并保证将在你起兵反抗 [Root.Liege.GeOnlyDynastyName]时派兵支援。

original: Time to prepare for war, then...
translation: 是厉兵秣马的时候了，然后……

original: The time is now! [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] armies will sally forth to depose the [Root.Liege.GetOnlyDynastyName]s, and the might of the Franks will stand behind you!
translation: 时机就在今朝！[Root.GetOnlyDynastyName]的军队将冲出营寨消灭[Root.Liege.GetOnlyDynastyName]一族，法兰克的铁蹄将是你的后盾！

original: Make them suffer!
translation: 让他们受苦！

original: My [Root.GetLordLady], the news from Spain is that [From.GetTitledName] has risen in rebellion against the [target_liege.GetOnlyDynastyName]s. The time has come to honor our agreement and intervene with our armies to aid them.
translation: 我的[Root.GetLordLady]，西班牙那边传来了消息，[From.GetTitledName]对 [target_liege.GetOnlyDynastyName]发动了叛乱。是时候履行我们的诺言、出兵援助他们了。

original: Raise the banners and ride forth!
translation: 举旗出兵！

original: I have reconsidered. We'll leave them to their fate.
translation: 我已决定，让他们自生自灭吧。

original: My [Root.GetLordLady], we have finally gained our independence from the [Root.Liege.GetOnlyDynastyName]s. The Frankish ruler who aided us will expect that you honor your pledge and swear fealty. What is your command?
translation: 我的[Root.GetLordLady]，我们终于从[Root.Liege.GetOnlyDynastyName]家族的压迫中重新获得了独立。出兵支援我们的法兰克统治者将要求您履行您的效忠诺言。您意下如何？

original: My word is sacred and I shall honor it.
translation: 我一言九鼎，将履行诺言。

original: [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] take the Franks!
translation: 让法兰克蛮子去见[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]吧！

original: My [Root.GetLordLady], the treacherous [From.GetTitledName] has gone back on [From.GetHerHis] word and refused to swear fealty to you, in spite of you so generously helping [From.GetHerHim] gain [From.GetHerHis] independence from the Umayyads!
translation: 我的[Root.GetLordLady]，尽管您曾经无私援助，帮助[From.GetHerHim]从伍麦叶王朝获得了[From.GetHerHis]自由，但毫无信誉的[From.GetTitledName]仍然违背了当初[From.GetHerHis]诺言，拒绝向您发誓效忠！

original: Those treacherous [From.Culture.GetName]s!
translation: 这群背信弃义的[From.Culture.GetName]人！

original: Such treachery!
translation: 叛徒！

original: Call all Allies to War
translation: 召唤所有盟友加入战争

original: You are not at war, so you cannot currently Call any Vassals or Allies to War
translation: 你没有处于战争状态，因此你不能召唤封臣及盟友加入战争

original: §GHold §YControl§G to Call all Allies to War§!
translation: §G按住§YCtrl§G以召唤全部盟友加入战争§!

original: Charlemagne
translation: 查理曼

original: Early Western Clothing Pack
translation: 早期西欧服饰包

original: Early Eastern Clothing Pack
translation: 早期东方服饰包

original: Dynasty Shields Charlemagne
translation: 「查理曼」家族盾徽包

original: Behold! The world as we know it in the year of our Saviour, 1066. As you can tell, it is divided into distinct regions - Counties - each controlled by some ruler or another. Crusader Kings II is a game about these rulers, their families, relations, intrigue... and power. Be a conqueror or a peaceful family father, as you will, but know that most other characters will lust after more land, more Counties.\n\nCrusader Kings II is a real-time game. Close this window and unpause the game using the speed widget...
translation: 注意！在公元1066年的世界正如您所看到的，被分为许多不同的地域——伯爵领，每块伯爵领都由某位统治者控制着。《王国风云II》表现了这些统治者的个人、家族、关系、阴谋以及权力。是成为一名征服者还是一个温和的家族长者，都取决于玩家您的抉择，但是要记住不论您如何想，其他的角色都会渴求更多的土地与财富。\n\n《王国风云II》是一个实时战略游戏。关闭这个窗口并通过调节游戏速度继续游戏……

original: To load your troops onto ships, bring your Fleet into port by ordering it to move into one of your land Provinces. You can then move your Armies to the same Province, merge them by clicking the Merge Troops button like before and click the Embark Army button. You can also move your Armies onto a Fleet at sea by keeping the Fleet in a coastal sea Province and moving your troops onto your ships. Note that larger Fleets are required for transporting larger Armies.
translation: 为了将您的部队装载上船，请将您的舰队驶入一个陆地省份以令其入港。然后您可以将您的部队开入同一省份，通过点击军队上船键使得部队与舰队合并。你也可以让你在临海省份的军队直接移动到在邻近该省份洋面上的舰队上的形式使得部队登船。请注意，舰队越大，能装载的部队越多。

original: When your Armies stop in enemy lands, they will start to besiege any enemy Holdings. In order to fully occupy a Province, you will need to take every Holding in that Province. Winning a Siege takes time, and the attacking forces need to be larger than the defending Garrison. The more the attackers outnumber the defenders, the faster the siege will be. The Fort Level of the settlement will also affect the time it will take to siege. To view the Siege progress, select your Army or click on the Province under Siege.
translation: 当您的部队停留在敌人控制的领地的时候，他们将会围攻敌人的地产。您需要占领该省份内所有的地产以完全占据该省份。围攻战需要消耗时间，同时围攻部队人数必须多于守军。围攻部队越多，攻陷的时间越快。当地的要塞等级也会影响到围攻时间的长短。如果你想了解围攻的进度，请选择你的部队或者点击正在围攻的省份。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] held a grand tournament, inviting all the great lords and knights of the realm.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]举办了一场盛大的比武，邀请了国内所有的大领主和骑士前往参加。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] held a Furusiyya, inviting all the great warriors of the realm to compete in skill at arms.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]举办了一场马术大会，邀请了国内所有的勇士们前往比试武艺。

original: Your [Root.GetChancellorName], [Root.job_chancellor.GetTitledFirstName], has offered to go through your newly acquired demesne titles and distribute them to existing or new vassals in order to ease your burden of government.
translation: 你的[Root.GetChancellorName]，[Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName]，建议你清理掉你新取得的头衔并将其分封给新老封臣以减轻你的统治负担。

original: Your [Root.GetTreasurerName], [Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName], has offered to go through your newly acquired demesne titles and distribute them to existing or new vassals in order to ease your burden of government.
translation: 你的[Root.GetTreasurerName]，[Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName]，建议你清理掉你新取得的头衔并将其分封给新老封臣以减轻你的统治负担。

original: Your [Root.GetLordSpiritualName], [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledFirstName], has offered to go through your newly acquired demesne titles and distribute them to existing or new vassals in order to ease your burden of government.
translation: 你的[Root.GetLordSpiritualName]，[Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstName]，建议你清理掉你新取得的头衔并将其分封给新老封臣以减轻你的统治负担。

original: Spymaster increases plot power
translation: 间谍总管可以提升阴谋力量

original: Send Spymaster [Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName] to the plot!
translation: 让间谍总管[Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName]参与到阴谋中！

original: Spymaster increases plot power
translation: 间谍总管提升阴谋力量

original: Plot Power Increase
translation: 阴谋力量提升

original: Berber Cavalry
translation: 柏柏尔骑兵

original: §Y[Actor.GetTitledFirstName]§! is independent
translation: §Y[Actor.GetTitledFirstName]§!是独立的

original: Baron Vicereine
translation: 女城镇总督

original: Count Vicereine
translation: 女省总督

original: Minor Vicereine
translation: 女公国总督

original: Vicereine
translation: 女总督

original: Grand Vicereine
translation: 女大总督

original: Heinrich was the son of Holy Roman Emperor Heinrich III, and like his father before him became King of the Germans at a very young age. He nearly drowned at the age of 12 when trying to escape a kidnapping at the hands of the Archbishop of Cologne during an ultimately successful political coup against his mother for the regency. Once an adult, he spent a lot of time balancing between the many powerful interest groups within his vast empire. He fought several wars against rebellious princes and against the Pagan Slavs. Heinrich also had a bitter controversy with the Pope Gregory VII over investiture, leading to his excommunication. Faced with possible rebellion in the Empire, Heinrich was forced to humiliate himself by standing on his knees in a blizzard for three days at Canossa while awaiting the Pope's pardon.
translation: 海因里希是神圣罗马帝国皇帝海因里希三世之子，与他父亲一样，他在幼年时期就即位为德意志人的国王了。在他12岁时，宫廷里爆发了针对他母亲的政变，摄政权为科隆大主教所夺。在政变中，为了试图逃脱科隆大主教的绑架，海因里希差点溺死。当他成年后，海因里希为了平衡庞大帝国内的各个利益集团而耗费了大量的精力。他同叛乱的领主和斯拉夫异教徒之间爆发了多场战争。海因里希还同教宗额我略七世之间就主教叙任权问题发生了激烈的争执，这直接导致了他被教会绝罚。面对着帝国内即将爆发的叛乱，海因里希被迫耻辱地在卡诺莎城堡外的风雪中跪了三天三夜以乞求教宗的赦免。

original: Administration
translation: 行政体制

original: An empire can be run according to the feudal system or with an imperial administration of the Roman model. The latter, however, is not easily available and may require extensive reforms.
translation: 一个帝国既可以采用封建体制也可以采用罗马式的帝国行政体制。后者较难建成，并且需要多次改革才能达到。

original: Feudal Administration
translation: 封建体制

original: Feudal
translation: 封建

original: A feudal society is a hierarchy of landed lords, where each person in the system owes fealty to those directly above and commands those directly below. It is the way most of the medieval world works, and it means that the ruler depends greatly on the loyalty of [Player.GetHerHis] more powerful vassals.
translation: 封建社会是一种主要由封建领主构成的等级社会，其中的每一个成员都直接对上级领主效忠并直接指挥着下级领主。这是中世纪时期最普遍的社会形态，在这种社会形态中，领主的统治很大程度上是建立在众多强大封臣对[Player.GetHerHis]忠诚之上。

original: Imperial Administration
translation: 帝国行政体制

original: Imperial
translation: 帝国

original: This system of administration is similar to that of the Roman Empire, with a hierarchy of magistrates and functionaries running daily business in the name of the emperor. It allows for a power structure that hands less power to permanently landed vassals.
translation: 这种政治体制类似于罗马帝国时期的体制，由不同等级的官吏体系以皇帝的名义对国家日常事务进行处理，这种体制通过削弱地方封臣的权力来使得政权稳固。

original: Strategos
translation: 将军

original: Exarch
translation: 都督

original: Grand Exarch
translation: 大都督

original: Theme of
translation: 军区

original: Exarchate of
translation: 行省

original: Grand Exarchate of
translation: 管区

original: Enables Low Centralization Laws for Dukes and above.\n
translation: 对公爵及以上封臣执行限制王权法律。\n

original: Enables Medium Centralization Laws for Dukes and above.\n
translation: 对公爵及以上封臣执行中等王权法律。\n

original: Enables High Centralization Laws for Dukes and above.\n
translation: 对公爵及以上封臣执行高王权法律。\n

original: Enables Absolute Centralization Laws for Dukes and above.\n
translation: 对公爵及以上封臣执行绝对王权法律。\n

original: Disables Low Centralization.\n
translation: 撤销限制王权法律。\n

original: Disables Medium Centralization.\n
translation: 撤销中等王权法律。\n

original: Disables High Centralization.\n
translation: 撤销高王权法律。\n

original: Disables Absolute Centralization.\n
translation: 撤销绝对王权法律。\n

original: Allows Adopting Feudalism.\nAllows Founding Merchant Republic.\n
translation: 允许采用封建制。\n允许建立商业共和国。\n

original: Disallows Adopting Feudalism.\nDisallows Founding Merchant Republic.\n
translation: 禁止采用封建制。\n禁止建立商业共和国。\n

original: [Root.GetDynName] was crowned Holy Roman Emperor by [Root.RelHead.GetBestName] on [GetDateText], thus restoring the Roman Empire in the West.
translation: [Root.GetDynName]由[Root.RelHead.GetBestName]于[GetDateText]加冕为神圣罗马帝国皇帝，从而重建了西罗马帝国。

original: The Holy Roman Empire
translation: 神圣罗马帝国

original: Since the fall of The Western Roman Empire in 476, the Emperor of Byzantium has been the sole claimant to the heritage of the Caesars. There has always been a rift between the Greek and Latin worlds, not least in matters of the Church. The Popes in Rome have for a long time made their own policies, refusing to accept Byzantine supremacy and denying that the Emperor in Constantinople would hold a legitimate claim to authority over Christendom.\n\n[From.GetDynName] has now been crowned Holy Roman Emperor by [From.RelHead.GetBestName], invoking the translatio imperii and restoring the Western Roman Empire. This perhaps signifies a new era in the history of Europe, and is definitely a confirmation of the longstanding rift between East and West.
translation: 自从西罗马帝国于公元476年灭亡之后，拜占庭皇帝成为了罗马帝位的唯一继承人。但是拉丁文明和希腊文明总是会有隔阂，这种隔阂早已由教会方面的分歧蔓延至其他方面。罗马教宗长期以来自成一派，拒绝承认拜占庭教会的领导权以及君士坦丁堡的东罗马皇帝对整个基督教世界的宗主权。\n\n[From.GetDynName]现在已经由[From.RelHead.GetBestName]加冕为神圣罗马帝国皇帝，继承了西罗马的帝统并重建了西罗马帝国。这意味着成为欧洲历史进入了一个新纪元，标志着东西方基督教世界正式陷入了长期对立。

original: Glory!
translation: 荣耀！

original: A powerful empire indeed.
translation: 确实是一个强大的帝国。

original: Strange tidings...
translation: 奇怪的消息……

original: I laugh at this toy emperor.
translation: 跳梁小丑，沐猴而冠。

original: The Coronation of Charlemagne
translation: 查理曼的加冕

original: Having taken the reins of power without fear, defeated his enemies and ruled the Frankish realms successfully, [From.GetFirstNameWithNick] was finally crowned emperor on [GetDateText]. He stood still as a statue and cold as ice before the throne as the crown of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] was solemnly placed upon his head. True heir to his father Pepin, descendant of Karl the Hammer, leader of men and master of war, he was claiming his exalted place in history. He looked out across the gathered lords and priests, his eye fixed on something beyond this triumphant moment, something great, a new ambition...
translation: 在成功地掌握权力、击败敌人并统治法兰克王国后，[From.GetFirstNameWithNick]终于在 [GetDateText]加冕称帝。他庄重地站在王座前，将[From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]的头冠严肃地戴在头上。他是父亲丕平的继承人！他是祖父铁锤查理的后裔！他是人民的领袖！他是不败的战神！他向世人宣告他的英名将永垂青史。他的目光早已穿过了下面的贵族和教士们，穿过了辉煌的当下，展望着更伟大、更灿烂的未来……

original: [Root.GetTitledNameWithNick] narrowly escaped imprisonment by [From.GetTitledNameWithNick] and was forced to raise [Root.GetHerHis] flag in rebellion.
translation: [Root.GetTitledNameWithNick]勉强逃脱了[From.GetTitledNameWithNick]的监禁并被迫树起了[Root.GetHerHis]叛旗。

original: [Root.GetTitledNameWithNick] tried but failed to imprison [From.GetTitledNameWithNick], causing [From.GetHerHim] to come out in open rebellion.
translation: [Root.GetTitledNameWithNick]试图监禁[From.GetTitledNameWithNick]但是失败了，这导致[From.GetHerHim]逃走并揭竿而起。

original: [Root.GetDynName] inherited the [From.GetName] from [FromFrom.GetDynName].
translation: [Root.GetDynName]从[FromFrom.GetDynName]继承了[From.GetName]。

original: Light Skirmish
translation: 轻装散兵
